alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 11:14PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT DUVAL...SOUTHEASTERN WEBB AND SOUTHWESTERN JIM WELLS COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Rosita to near Las Lomitas to 7 miles north of Zapata County Airport. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... San Diego, Freer, Benavides, Mirando City, Oilton, Ramirez, San Jose, Ben Bolt, Concepcion, Palito Blanco, Realitos, Bruni, Cruz Calle, Rios, Rosita, and Alice Acres. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 678 and 682. US Highway 59 between mile markers 766 and 772. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
